item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
@Aaronlarchje

Portofolio

Showcase

PAPI Light System

This system checks between which rays the plane is flying, based upon that data lights will color red or white.

Night Vision Goggles System

Realistic NVG-System, Press N to Enabled/Disable.
NVG goggles will rotate in Place and you’ll be able to see In the dark.

In-Game Phone Software system

Able to Post Messages On Social Media, the UserName text would be the Players Username, the circular image would be the profilepicture and in the blank space there would be the users message.

Interactive Cockpits For Blizzard Helis

The standard Blizzard Helicopters Don’t come with an Interactive Cockpit, even more: you cannot go first-person. Therefore I’ve made some Cockpits where Statuses are displayed and the Battery/Engine can be turned on From within the Cockpit.

Loadout System

This was for a game that I never got to release where you would be able to change the Loadout of your character. The Primary, Secondary, Vest, Helmet, Face, Backpack were all changeable.

Nuclear Fusion Reactor

There would be a control Room With all sorts of Interactible Parts (Buttons, Levers,…) To Enable/Disable certain systems. Statuses Such as the Core Temperature would also have been displayed.

item.title: Services
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Aarons Portfolio

As a Developer with 6+ years Experience I guarantee a mix of Quality and Performance. Please Contact me If you are In need of a system and do not want to worry about the quality or how it impacts performance of your game.

You can contact me via Discord: aaronamraam

item.title: About
item.content:encoded:
About me

My name is Aaron, and I’m a guy from Belgium. I am enrolled as an NCO Artillery in the Belgian Military, and as a hobby, I develop.

When I was 13 years old, I learned my first programming language, which was Batch. Then, I started learning JS and Luau, followed by other languages.

My passion for Roblox development has never stopped since then!

Welcome to Aarons Portfolio

View services
